arts.ttl: Hansi Flick labels Barcelona star a ‘genius’ after win over Alavés
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has on Sunday evening moved to lavish fresh praise on youngster Lamine Yamal. This comes owing to the 17-year-old’s latest starring performance. Lamine was for…

arts.ttl: ‘What day is it? I have no f***ing idea’ - Gavi’s chat with Barca doc revealed
arts.sum: Gavi really didn’t want to go off but had the decision taken out of his hands by the team doctor and manager Hansi Flick. Raphinha then wandered over and told Gavi “You’ve had a blow to the head, brother” while Flick and the medics had a chat.

arts.ttl: Pedri and Yamal keeping Barca’s title tilt on track
arts.sum: Pedri won all of his 11 duels in the match, becoming only the third Barca player in the last 10 seasons to have a 100% success rate in a match when contesting more than 10 duels. A title race that’s still potentially alive for Barca thanks to the incredible efforts of Pedri and Lamine Yamal on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Alavés manager credits one Barcelona star with changing the game
arts.sum: Deportivo Alavés head coach Eduardo Coudet has revealed his opinion that the introduction of one Barcelona star changed the flow of proceedings between the sides earlier today. Barcelona of course…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star joins Cristiano Ronaldo & Luis Suárez in exclusive club with latest goal
arts.sum: Barcelona star Robert Lewandowski has on Sunday joined two of the greatest La Liga players of the modern era in an exclusive goalscoring club. This comes owing to his exploits…

arts.ttl: Watch: Barcelona’s Lamine Yamal produced a Leo Messi-esque run vs Alavés
arts.sum: Barcelona youngster Lamine Yamal was responsible for a moment of sheer individual brilliance during the club’s latest outing. Wide-man Lamine was for his part in from the off once more…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star ignored Pedri’s plea late in Alavés clash
arts.sum: An interesting still shot of an exchange between Barcelona pair Pedri and Wojciech Szczęsny has on Sunday evening come to the fore online. This of course comes after both played…

arts.ttl: Barcelona set for imminent transfer funds boost
arts.sum: La Liga giants Barcelona are in line for an incoming boost on the financial front. This comes amid confirmation of Estanis Pedrola’s imminent move from Sampdoria to Serie A outfit…

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal equalled a Real Madrid star’s La Liga dribbling benchmark in Barcelona 1-0 Alavés
arts.sum: A statistic, highlighting the extent of the on-ball brilliance conjured up by Barcelona star Lamine Yamal against Deportivo Alavés, has on Sunday evening come to the fore online. Barcelona, of…

arts.ttl: Barca offer Gavi update after midfielder is taken to hospital with head injury
arts.sum: Laporta says he’s spoken with Gavi and told fans not to worry as the youngster, and Conechny, are both feeling fine. “He’s in the hospital and he and Conechny are fine.
